1088251937.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

items.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

oneOf.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

1088251937.title: Filter Group

filters.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

3235433757.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

AND.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

NOT.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

OR.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

all.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

all_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

any.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

3235433757.title: Filter Group Map

domain.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

subject.description: The subject of this filter test.

test.description: The name of the test to apply.

value.description: The value being compared with the test.

description: Allows the mob to accept flowers from another mob with the minecraft:offer_flower behavior.

filters.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

max_head_rotation_y.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

max_rotation_x.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

max_wait_time.description: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) for the mob to randomly wait for before taking the flower.

min_distance_to_target.description: Minimum distance (in blocks) for the entity to be considered having reached its target.

min_wait_time.description: The minimum amount of time (in seconds) for the mob to randomly wait for before taking the flower.

on_take_flower.description: Event triggered when the entity takes a flower from another entity.

search_area.description: The dimensions of the AABB used to search for a potential mob to take a flower from.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

title: minecraft:behavior.take_flower
